  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie​(java.lang.String title, int year, java.lang.String director, double rating, java.lang.Integer[] genres)
      Instantiates a Movie object.
      Parameters:
      title - movie title
      year - year of release
      director - name of director
      rating - rating of 1 - 10 from IMDB
      genres - numbers representing movie genres list

  • Method Details

    • genresStringToList

      public static java.lang.Integer[] genresStringToList​(java.lang.String string)
      Converts a string of the form "2,3,6" to an array of Integer objects, [2, 3, 6]. Used when reading Movie objects from a file.
      Parameters:
      string - The string to convert to an array.
      Returns:
      The array version of string.

    • main

      Parameters:

    • menu

      public static java.lang.String menu()
      Returns a string of all genres in the Movie.GENRES list. Use for input menus. Formatted as " 3: romance"
      Returns:
      the genres.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Movie that)
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Movie>

    • genresListToNames

      public java.lang.String genresListToNames()
      Converts a list of genre integers to a string of genre names.
      Returns:
      comma delimited string of genre names based upon the current movie object's integer genres list. e.g.: [0, 2] returns "science fiction, drama"
